div.p: BELIEVE IN THE TRUENESS OF THE BIBLE.
LISP TONIGHT. YOU MAY REMEMBER ACTOR RICK
MORANIS BECAME FAMOUS IN "GHOST BUSTERS," AND "HONEY I SHRUNK
THE KIDS". >> I PLANNED A LITTLE KICKOFF
SURPRISE, WE ARE GOING TO USE MARSHMALLOWS AND GUM DROPS TO
MAKE WATER MOLECULES. >> HE WALKED AWAY FROM THE
ENTERTAINMENT INDUSTRY IN ORDER TO RAISE HIS TWO CHILDREN.
MORANIS IS A MAN AND A GOOD GUY TO BOOT.
HE WROTE THIS COLUMN, THE TIP OF THE DAY, CHECK OUT RICK MORANIS
IN "THE WALL STREET JOURNAL." WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF
